name: MECH ZERO: Lost in Space
description:
MECH ZERO: Lost in Space is a Hack'n'Slash Action game where you control a robot that is on the run due to the fact that it is a machine of mass destruction, that is, it was programmed to kill.

In the Year 2575, the entire galaxy was taken over by the machines, which started a revolution that wiped out 100% of the human race. Over time, the robots were doing research with the desire to develop a machine of mass destruction, in which no other existing robot could defeat it, after many failures, they managed to create a high-performance robot that they dubbed MECH ZERO, a robot highly capable of destroying everything around it.

  • Step into the shoes of a highly capable robot to destroy everything that gets in its way and find unique abilities.
  • Big 3D World with a wide range of interactions.
  • Unique enemies, each with a different skill, face each other in the best possible way.
GameModes:
  • Story Mode:. Get into the skin, or rather, the carcass of MECH ZERO to try to escape from all who seek your destruction.
  • Challenge Mode:. Find super challenging missions, can you pass ?
Languages:
  • English (standard).
  • Portuguese Brazil (In Development).

A game by TalyBayStudios
